body:
This PR is ready to merge, approved by @desaikomal, @qqu0127, and @xyuanlu 
Commit message:
Modified transactionOp test case variable for clearer understanding. Added more comments to test cases.

> Thanks a lot @jiajunwang for the review and valuable feedback! I totally agree with your thought process on retrying tests only when it makes sense but for now we have unstable CI and it's such a pain for contributor to submit a PR then wait for results and if any tests fail then verify it locally (which most of the times it works). This is an attempt to reduce that pain. I totally understand that it might not help or resolve this issue but i can try :)
> 
> Hence i have not yet published this PR, first let me try this CI couple of times and if i have enough confidence on this that it's giving positive results then i can submit it for review :) BTW jFYI i have also picked up few top failing UTs and trying dig deeper to understand fundamental cause of failure so i will continue that effort in parallel to this patch fixes. Let me know if that makes sense.

I guess it makes sense because if the test fails today, people are just manually retrying. So it helps to avoid that part of human toils. Given that saying, one thing I belive is necessary is to count the retried tests as unstable tests as well. We don't want to lost track of unstable test signal, even we want to make people's life easier.
@junkaixue can you please take a look whenever you can :)

Thanks @junkaixue  for the approval! Yup addressed other comments. 
The PR is ready to merge!
Commit message :
Adding a manual workflow which allows triggering CI with custom maven options on any PR

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @desaikomal, @qqu0127, and @junkaixue 
Commit message:
Enable MSDS auto refresh for DedicatedZkClient

PR ready to merge. Approved by @NealSun96 
Commit message :
Update Helix-Manual-CI.yml

The context is passed to user callback. If user need an object while executing callback, we need to provide them the option. 
As a reference, ZK async API provides the same signature. Helix pass a retry event handling object in this context for retry when failure.
Why the context cannot be passed in callback as an argument?

> Why the context cannot be passed in callback as an argument?

I did not quite follow. We will pass the context to user callback as an argument when metaclient invoke the callback. (in pr #2372)
@qqu0127 can i get your feedback/review on this please?

Ready to merge, Approved by @qqu0127!
Commit message :
Add rerun option for failing flaky tests from CI pipeline.

> 

TFTR. ZkMetaClient impl will instantiate this class. Will test the logic when testing async APIs in zkMetaclient implementation.

Removed context field as our offline discussion. Caller should maintain and manager object they owned if it is needed in callback function. User object should not be passed to client if client does not use this info.

This PR is ready for merge. Commit message:
Update async API for metaclient.

PR is ready to be merged. Final commit message 
"Add wrapper file for meta client async callback class"

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @xyuanlu 
Commit message: 
Create separate API for persistent and one-time listener

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @qqu0127
Commit message:
Implementation of Container Nodes in ZkMetaClient
If this changes logic, let's remove "refactor" word. Refactor means the logic is not changed.

After internal syncup, it makes sense to not have this real-time metric. Helix will emit a metric as a part of current default pipeline (which is triggered on any helix event), to report number of partitions with missing top state beyond set threshold value. I will close this PR and create a new one to address this.

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @desaikomal 
Commit message: Typo cleanup and code style change in metaclient

Approved by @qqu0127 , Ready to merge!
Commit message : Adding a new metric to report number of partitions with missing top state beyond threshold

Thanks for making the change. Code change looks good to me. I would suggest resolve open question and then let's put conclusion in comment, and merge the change. I prefer not to have open comment in final code.
After internal syncup, it would not makes sense to update this value handoff metrics since this handoff times could be large and may clutter other values. Hence helix can log this values at most.

Not an expert here but just curious don't we need few other changes like adding new dependencies in jdk 11, GC options and few newer APIs changes. (reference : https://gist.github.com/dineshbhagat/97eff450e9edbd7d006deb35f28e3fd4)

Thanks @xyuanlu for approval. Re-ran failing UT. It passed :
```
[INFO] Tests run: 2, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 124.355 s - in org.apache.helix.integration.messaging.TestP2PNoDuplicatedMessage
[INFO]
[INFO] Results:
[INFO]
[INFO] Tests run: 2, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
```

Commit message : Adding a new metric to report number of partitions with missing top state beyond threshold duration.
JDK11 - optimization work can start once we have the base line.

Thank you all (@junkaixue , @mgao0 , @rahulrane50 , @qqu0127 ) for the review. 
Change has been approved by @junkaixue , @mgao0 , @rahulrane50 and @qqu0127.  Commit message : Upgrading Helix to use JDK 11.

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @junkaixue , thanks!

Final commit message: Refactor updating and searching for threadpool for state transition messages

> Overall LGTM! One general comment, Do we want to name all class as "_reconnect_policy" or "_retry_policy"? From your description and functionality it looks like later one to me.

TFTR. 
Retry connection policy - how we reconnection in a separate thread when connection lost. Different policies can be defined for this.
Retry - how we define behavior for retry CRUD operation when connection is lost. We only define timeout for this.

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @mgao0 @qqu0127 @xyuanlu 
Commit message: TTL Node Interface Methods

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @qqu0127 @xyuanlu . Thanks.

Final commit message: Add API for users to provide customized threadpool for different categories of state transition messages
Commit Message: The change has been reviewed and approved by @xyuanlu and ready to be checked-in.

This change is ready to be merged. Approved by @rahulrane50 

Commit message:
Add check in ZkClient.connect so it only called once. 

This change adds an extra check in ZkClient.connect so that it will only be invoked once.
Also avoid close called in between of isclosed check and connection establishment in connect().

This change is ready to be merged. Approved by @qqu0127 

Commit message: Add support for state change in ZkMetaClient

This PR is ready to merge, approved by @qqu0127
Commit message: TTL Node Lattice Implementation

This PR is ready to be merged, approved by @cliffordfajardo 
Final commit message:
## Add optional support for App Insights for Helix-Front (#2407)
